page.title: 04HOME LIFE WEEKEND MARKFIELD
page.content: On Saturday I woke up.Then I got out of bed and went downstairs.I went to the kitchen and had my breakfast. I had a bowl of cornflakes.When I finished I went to get dressed.I went to the bathroom and brushed my teeth.Then I went downstairs. My mum said we were going to Leicester for the day.So I went and sat in the car.My mum said I could have some new clothes and a pair of shoes.We went to Macdonalds for lunch.We then went home and I watched T.V.I had my tea and went out to play. I watched T.V. again before I went to bed. On Sunday I got up at 9.30 and watched T.V. while dad made the breakfast.Then I played rollerskating until lunch at 1.00.After lunch we played Jasper.We catch each other and join in a long line.Jasper is our bus driver for school.
